review: When it works it's great however it doesn't work all the tome. I consistently have connection issues even when I tried a different USB and AC adapter. I bought one for a family member for Christmas and they do not have the same issues so possibly I received a bad device?!
author: Tamar Excell

review: I bought this when you could display anything in a browser on your TV. Soon Google disabled that useful feature. I finally broke down and tried to play a rented movie from Google Play. I was unable to get the movie to play through Chromecast and had to watch it on the tiny screen on my android phone.Don't buy this useless gadget.
author: Robert L Benedict

review: Chromecast is easy to install and use. Works well for me.  I have not had any issues with it so far.
author: Buntz

review: One issue is the lack of compatible apps. Netflix and Youtube are great, but there isn't much more you can stream app wise.We use it mostly to cast tabs from Chrome on our laptop. It worked great for a few months and since then has been continually losing the signal. We can't make it through a one hour episode of a show without having it crash at least 3 times. For a couple of months now the support page has said it's a known issue and that they're working on it...Great idea. Disappointing execution.
author: Vanessa Dahlberg

review: I never knew how much I would really use this thing til it arrived. Easy to setup and use!Well worth the cost
author: Dave Morrow

review: Its ok, I like the Roku much better.  This item streams very slow and very limited, it can't stream Amazon Prime
author: Rachelle S.

review: Chromecast really is great for Netflix, and my newly found Songza. It makes Netflix streaming so easy. I just open my phone (which I admit is at my side at all times) and I get to a movie or show right away.Previously, I had to hook my laptop via HDMI and then to pause the show, get up and walk over the computer. Now, its right at my phone (Samsung 4S).Set-up was easy boda-bing. Even for a low-tech like me.Just in time, too. I was just starting on the old "24" tv shows and this makes it a snap. Netflix remembers where I was and we just continue on. Also, having fun streaming Youtube, and Chrome tabs.Product recommended.
author: J. Ryan

review: Very good. Works just as expected. Still not good enough to play your local content since there are some expensive not integrated softwares to do this.
author: Gaston Labadie

review: Great device to stream too, and I'm looking forward to the sdk improving the number of apps that support the Chromecast.My only wish is that this supported 5GHz networks.
